wordGroup: self evident 不言而喻的；不证自明的

sentences.en: The threat of inflation is already evident in bond prices.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀的威胁在证券价格上已经是明显可见的。

sentences.en: It was evident that someone had gone through my possessions.
sentences.cn: 显然有人翻过我的物品。

sentences.en: The privations of monastery life were evident in his appearance.
sentences.cn: 修道院生活的清苦从他的穿着外表明显地表露出来。
